Package model.objective

Class DiagonalShapeObjective

java.lang.Object
model.objective.DiagonalShapeObjective
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Objective
public class DiagonalShapeObjective extends Object implements Objective
objective in a diagonal shape composed of three cards identified by their relative coordinates referred to the one on the right

  • Method Details

    • countObjectivePoints

      public int countObjectivePoints(PlacementArea placementArea)
      This method counts the objective points based on the placementArea. It returns twice the result of verifying the objective with the given shape and elements.
      Specified by:
      countObjectivePoints in interface Objective
      Parameters:
      placementArea - the disposition to find objectives in
      Returns:
      the number of points related to this objective
